item.title: By: Gordon Pattison
item.dc:creator: Gordon Pattison
item.description: When I lived on Bunker Hill in the 1940's - 50's, I used to like to go into the delicatessen on my way back to the Castle from downtown via Angels Flight. If it was a hot summer day, I'd get a Pepsi from the cooler inside. In the movie, when Dick Powell walks into the delicatessen, he goes right by the cooler with the bottles inside. It is achingly nostalgic for me.
